steps.name: Verify that the user is logged
Enter custom message: Message to check how it works
Verify that the alert about successful invite is displayed
Verify that the recipient's name is FGYChZt in "Outgoing invites"
Verify that the status of the invitation is Pending registration
Verify that the email message is correct
